links.title: Can Square (NYSE:SQ) Bridge Bitcoin (BTC) and Banking?
links.description: What is the bridge from current banking to Bitcoin (BTC)? This question addresses what should be considered the most logical next step for cryptocurrency. Finding a way to embrace Bitcoin (BTC), without having to understand cold wallet storage and face potential crypto exchange scams, is key to cyryptocurrency adoption by the general population.

links.title: Yes, The Petro-Yuan Is A Threat To The U.S. Dollar
links.description: I recently encountered a blog post by respected commentator Mish Shedlock entitled, " Petro-Yuan Futures Launch In March: Ignore The Hype, It's A Good Thing." In this article, Shedlock argues that the new futures will pose no threat to the US dollar as the global reserve currency even if the futures do result in oil being priced in yuan.
